body_html:
I've discovered through finding a snippet via the forums that allow for image loading via openCV directly (wooh!), I'm still a bit unclear how to extract data from an at::tensor into a blob form compatible with opencv for rendering, or serializing as an image, but baby steps...

https://gist.github.com/zeryx/526dbc05479e166ca7d512a670e6b82d

I've discovered through finding a snippet via the forums that allow for image loading via openCV directly (wooh!), I'm still a bit unclear how to extract data from an at::tensor into a blob form compatible with opencv for rendering, or serializing as an image, but baby steps...

body:
I've discovered through finding a snippet via the forums that allow for image loading via openCV directly (wooh!), I'm still a bit unclear how to extract data _from_ an at::tensor into a blob form compatible with opencv for rendering, or serializing as an image, but baby steps...

https://gist.github.com/zeryx/526dbc05479e166ca7d512a670e6b82d
